author: ringstrom
msg: * 1.0-stabilization/STATUS: Add three items, vote for them, and hide
in shame for bringing up three new issues this late...

author: dws
msg: packages/rpm/redhat-8+/subversion.spec: Build Perl bindings for Subversion.
*** Note: This makes it conditional on Redhat 7.x, which would require
an upgrade to at least perl-5.8.0 to be able to build these bindings.

author: kfogel
msg: Partially resolve issue #1687: cvs2svn should warn instead of error
This takes care of the "branch XXX already has name YYY" error, along
with some test framework cleanup to support non-fatal errors from here
(CollectData.add_branch_point): Remove this method, merge its code
(CollectData.set_branch_name): Warn and do nothing if this branch
number already has a name, else set both mappings.
(run_program, run_cvs2svn): Raise exception if expected error absent.
(Log.absorb_changed_paths): Factor some code, and leave a note about
Fix misleading message in the log data.
